author: aharui
msg: rewrite nodebasetests to read unittest.properties to determine FLEX_HOME and PLAYERGLOBAL_HOME values.  If file doesn't exist, defaults to where the copy.sdk target copies the SDK (../compiler/generated/dist/sdk)

author: gordonsmith
msg: Fixed bugs that I previously found with <XML> tags. We now have 5 passing tests for <XML>.
Added @Ignore to one of the MXMLVectorTagTests that was failing. I thought it used to pass so I'm not sure what happened.
